long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable all images to avoid distraction and block all addictive websites. Open Source, Free and Always will be !! It will help you quit adult content, and social media addiction, news medias etc etc. This plugin will help you control what content enter your mind, YOU control your environment, what you want to see and what you want to avoid. And hopefully will also help you reduce stress and  save you many hours of your precious time ! You will discover a new form of ultra-productivity.
